EmailTemplate.textOnly: Whether you're about to start acid reflux disease treatment with NEXIUM or you've taken it for a while, it's important to know what NEXIUM offers.NEXIUM helps relieve heartburn In fact, for many people, one NEXIUM pill a day provides relief from persistent, frequent heartburn symptoms — day or night. Your results with NEXIUM may vary.NEXIUM can heal potential damage that acid reflux disease may cause Over time, acid reflux can damage your esophagus, and this can lead to a potentially serious condition called erosive esophagitis. Only a doctor can diagnose this condition. NEXIUM can heal this damage within 4 to 8 weeks. Your results with NEXIUM may vary.The more you understand about how NEXIUM can both relieve heartburn symptoms and heal possible damage, the more you'll want to have a conversation with your doctor.
